title: Knowledge-Reuse Transfer Learning Methods in Molecular and Material Science
abstract: arXiv:2403.12982v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: Molecules and materials are the foundation for the development of modern advanced industries such as energy storage systems and semiconductor devices. However, traditional trial-and-error methods or theoretical calculations are highly resource-intensive, and extremely long R&D (Research and Development) periods cannot meet the urgent need for molecules/materials in industrial development. Machine learning (ML) methods based on big data are expected to break this dilemma. However, the difficulty in constructing large-scale datasets of new molecules/materials due to the high cost of data acquisition and annotation limits the development of machine learning. The application of transfer learning lowers the data requirements for model training, which makes transfer learning stand out in researches addressing data quality issues. translated_title: 分子和材料科学中的知识重用迁移学习方法
translated_abstract: 分子和材料是现代先进产业发展的基础，如能源储存系统和半导体器件。然而，传统的试错方法或理论计算具有极高的资源消耗，极长的研发周期无法满足工业发展中对分子/材料的迫切需求。基于大数据的机器学习方法有望打破这一困境。然而，由于数据获取和标注成本高昂，难以构建大规模新分子/新材料数据集，限制了机器学习的发展。迁移学习的应用降低了模型训练的数据要求，使得迁移学习在解决数据质量问题的研究中脱颖而出。在本综述中，我们总结了与分子和材料科学相关的迁移学习的最新进展。
tldr: 机器学习方法基于大数据可望打破分子材料研发困境，迁移学习降低了模型训练数据要求，对解决数据质量问题具有重要作用。
en_tdlr: Machine learning methods based on big data are expected to break the research and development dilemma in molecular and material science, transfer learning reduces the data requirements for model training and plays an important role in addressing data quality issues.
